bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 169, Number 47 (Tuesday, March 14, 2023)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SCALISE:
H.R. 1.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The power granted to Congress under Article I, Section 8 of
the United States Constitution.
The single subject of this legislation is:
To lower energy costs by increasing American energy
production and restoring energy leadership.
[Page H1286]

latestAction.text: The Clerk was authorized to correct section numbers, punctuation, and cross references, and to make other necessary technical and conforming corrections in the engrossment of H.R. 1.

bill.title: Lower Energy Costs Act
